PlatformIO
  • “platformio.ini” (Project Configuration File)
  • Section [env]
  • Upload options
  • upload_speed
  • Edit on GitHub

upload_speed

Type: Number | Multiple: No

A connection speed (baud rate) which “uploader” tool uses when sending firmware to board.

Common baud rates

Below are common baud rates for reference:

Bauds

Bits/s

Bit duration

Speed (bytes/s)

Actual speed (bytes/s)

Actual byte duration
